Player History
Released by Milwaukee on 3/2/1965...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/2/1967 to a 2-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Injured on 9/4/1968 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
Released by Texas on 2/13/1970...
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1972...
Injured on 5/12/1972 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 6/20/1973 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1976, off Rich Gossage (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/1976, off Billy Farmer (CHC)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1976, hitting .435 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1976, hitting .270 with 27 HR, 113 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles on 4/9/1977...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1980, hitting .550 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Los Angeles on 3/2/1981 (Going to LA: C G. Carter. Going to PIT: SS C. Ripken Jr., P S. Howe, CF J. Eisenreich)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1981, hitting .313 with 6 HR, 35 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1981...
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 9/29/1982...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Chicago (N) on 5/19/1984...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Traded from Los Angeles to New York (N) on 1/31/1985 (Going to LA: RF D. Strawberry. Going to NYM: C G. Carter, CF K. Yamamoto, 2B J. Ray)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1985, hitting .365 with 6 HR, 18 RBI...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
